get.summary: Queryable GET endpoint

parameters.name: $filter
parameters.description: Filters the results, based on a Boolean condition.

parameters.name: $select
parameters.description: Selects which properties to include in the response.

parameters.name: $top
parameters.description: Returns only the first n results.

parameters.name: attributeKeys
parameters.description: Specify a comma-delimited list of attribute keys to limit to specific attributes,

post.summary: Posts the specified value.

get.summary: GET endpoint to get a single record

parameters.name: attributeKeys
parameters.description: Specify a comma-delimited list of attribute keys to limit to specific attributes,

put.summary: Puts the specified identifier.

delete.summary: Deletes the specified identifier.

patch.summary: PATCH endpoint. Use this to update a subset of the properties of the record

post.summary: POST an attribute value. Use this to set an attribute value for the record

delete.summary: DELETE to delete the specified attribute value for the record

get.summary:
Gets a list of groups surrounding the specified lat/long, optionally limited to the specified geofenceGroupTypeId
If geofenceGroupTypeId is specified, the list of GeoFence groups will be returned with the groups as child groups of that geofence group.

Gets a list of groups surrounding the specified the location, optionally limited to the specified geofenceGroupTypeId
If geofenceGroupTypeId is specified, the list of GeoFence groups will be returned with the groups as child groups of that geofence group.

parameters.name: sortByDistance
parameters.description: if set to true [sort by distance].

get.summary: Gets the children.

parameters.name: limitToSecurityRoleGroups
parameters.description: if set to true [limit to security role groups].

parameters.name: includeInactiveGroups
parameters.description: if set to true [include inactive groups].

parameters.name: campusId
parameters.description: if set it will filter groups based on campus

parameters.name: includeNoCampus
parameters.description: if campus set and set to true [include groups with no campus].

parameters.name: limitToPublic
parameters.description: if set to true [limit to public groups].

parameters.name: limitToSchedulingEnabled
parameters.description: if set to true only includes groups that have SchedulingEnabled (or has a child group that has SchedulingEnabled).

parameters.name: limitToRSVPEnabled
parameters.description: if set to true only includes groups that have RSVPEnabled (or has a child group that has RSVPEnabled).

parameters.description: Filters the results, based on a Boolean condition.

parameters.description: Returns only the first n results.

get.summary: Exports Person Records

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The page being requested (where first page is 1).

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: The number of records to provide per page. NOTE: This is limited to the 'API Max Items Per Page' global attribute.

parameters.name: sortBy
parameters.description: Optional field to sort by. This must be a mapped property on the Person model.

parameters.name: sortDirection
parameters.description: The sort direction (1 = Ascending, 0 = Descending). Default is 1 (Ascending).

parameters.name: dataViewId
parameters.description: The optional data view to use for filtering.

parameters.name: modifiedSince
parameters.description: The optional date/time to filter to only get newly updated items.

parameters.name: attributeKeys
parameters.description: Optional comma-delimited list of attribute keys for the attribute values that should be included with each exported record, or specify 'all' to include all attributes.

get.summary:
Gets the current person's impersonation token. This is used by external apps who might have a logged in person but
need to create a impersonation token to link to the website. For instance a mobile app might have the current person
and have a cookie, but would like to link out to the website.
Gets the graduation year based on the provided GradeOffset

parameters.name: gradeOffset
parameters.description: The grade offset for the person.

get.summary:
Creates and stores a new PersonToken for a person using the specified ExpireDateTime, UsageLimit, and Page
Returns the encrypted URLEncoded Token along with the ImpersonationParameter key in the form of "rckipid={ImpersonationParameter}"
Gets the count of interactions over several timeframes for the current or specified person.

parameters.name: personId
parameters.description: The person identifier. Optional. This defaults to the currently authenticated person.

parameters.name: date
parameters.description: The date. Optional. This defaults to today.

parameters.name: interactionChannelId
parameters.description: The interaction channel identifier. Optional filter.

parameters.name: interactionComponentId
parameters.description: The interaction component identifier. Optional filter.

parameters.name: interactionChannelGuid
parameters.description: The interaction channel unique identifier. Optional filter.

parameters.name: interactionComponentGuid
parameters.description: The interaction component unique identifier. Optional filter.

get.summary:
Gets a list of people's names, email, gender and birthdate, to see if there are potential duplicates.
For example, you might want to use this during account creation to warn that the person might already have an account.
Gets the search details (for the person picker)
Determines if the entity id is in the data view

post.summary: Launches a workflow. And optionally passes the entity with selected id as the entity for the workflow

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The Id of the entity to pass to workflow, if entity cannot be loaded workflow will still be launched but without passing an entity

requestBody.description: Optional list of workflow values to set.

post.summary: Unsubscribes a person from all email communications or a specific communication list if one is provided.
post.description: This endpoint is for email client one-click unsubscribe functionality (RFC8058). As of 12/13/2023, RFC8058 Section 3.1 states: The POST request MUST NOT include cookies, HTTP authorization, or any other context information. The unsubscribe operation is logically unrelated to any previous web activity, and context information could inappropriately link the unsubscribe to previous activity. For this reason, this endpoint does not and must not require authentication or authorization other than the encrypted person action identifier.

parameters.name: personActionIdentifier
parameters.description: The person action identifier. Action should be "Unsubscribe".

get.summary: Gets the popup html for the selected person
Gets the popup html for the selected person

parameters.name: emailAsLink
parameters.description: Determines if the email address should be formatted as a link.

get.summary: Returns results to the Person Picker

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The search parameter for the person's name.

parameters.name: includeDetails
parameters.description: Set to true details will be included instead of lazy loaded.

parameters.name: includeBusinesses
parameters.description: Set to true to also search businesses.

parameters.name: includeDeceased
parameters.description: Set to true to include deceased people.

parameters.name: address
parameters.description: The search parameter for the person's address.

parameters.name: phone
parameters.description: The search parameter for the person's phone.

parameters.name: email
parameters.description: The search parameter for the person's name email.

put.summary: Adds an attendance. If the AttendanceOccurrence record does not exist it is created. If the Attendance record already exists then it is updated.

parameters.name: personId
parameters.description: The person identifier. If provided it is used to get the primary PersonAliasId and takes precedence over "personAliasId"

parameters.name: personAliasId
parameters.description: The person alias identifier. Is not used if a "personId" is provided.

FamilyMembers.description: Gets or sets the family members.

Guid.description: Gets or sets the unique identifier.

FamilyMembers.description: Gets or sets the family members.

PersonAliasId.description: Gets or sets the person alias identifier.

Guid.description: Gets or sets the unique identifier.

FirstName.description: Gets or sets the first name.

LastName.description: Gets or sets the last name.

PhotoUrl.description: Gets or sets the photo URL.

CanCheckin.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether this instance can checkin.

GroupPage.description: Gets or sets the group page.

PersonProfilePage.description: Gets or sets the person profile page.

MapPage.description: Gets or sets the map page.

ContributionFinancialAccountId.description:
The Financial Account Id that will be the default gift designation for the person. Null value
clears the setting and requires the user to set before text-to-give will work for them.

FinancialPersonSavedAccountId.description:
The Saved Account associated with the person that will be used as the default payment method for
the person throughout Rock

BirthMonth.description: Gets or sets the birth month.

BirthDay.description: Gets or sets the birth day.

BirthYear.description: Gets or sets the birth year.

InteractionsAllTime.description: Gets or sets the interactions all time.

InteractionsThatDay.description: Gets or sets the interactions that day.

InteractionsThatMonth.description: Gets or sets the interactions that month.

InteractionsThatYear.description: Gets or sets the interactions that year.

Type.description: Gets or sets the type of phone number this instance represents.

Number.description: Gets or sets the formatted phone number this instance represents.

IsUnlisted.description: Gets or sets a value that indicates if this phone number is unlisted.

Rock.Rest.Controllers.PersonSearchPhoneN.description: A phone number that will be included in the search results.

Guid.description: Gets or sets the unique identifier of the person.

PrimaryAliasGuid.description: Gets or sets the unique identifier of the person's primary alias.

Name.description: Gets or sets the full name last first.

IsActive.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether this instance is active.

IsDeceased.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether this instance is deceased.

IsBusiness.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether this instance is a business.

ImageUrl.description: Gets or sets the person photo image to display.

ImageHtmlTag.description: Gets or sets the image HTML tag.

Age.description:
Gets or sets the age in years
NOTE: returns -1 if age is unknown

FormattedAge.description: Gets or sets the formatted age.

AgeClassification.description: Gets or sets the age classification value.

ConnectionStatus.description: Gets or sets the connection status.

ConnectionStatusColor.description: Gets or sets the color of the connection status.

RecordStatus.description: Gets or sets the record status.

SpouseName.description: Gets or sets the name of the spouse.

SpouseNickName.description: Gets or sets the nickname of the spouse.

CampusName.description: Gets or sets the name of the campus.

CampusShortCode.description: Gets or sets the campus short code.

PhoneNumbers.description: Gets or sets the phone numbers for this person.

PickerItemDetailsHtml.description: Gets or sets the picker item details HTML.

PickerItemDetailsImageHtml.description: Gets or sets the picker item details image HTML.

PickerItemDetailsPersonInfoHtml.description: Gets or sets the picker item details person information HTML.
